description: This Angular component class 'AdminUsersComponent' manages the user administration interface, including listing users, viewing user details, and sorting the user list. It imports Angular core modules, shared components, and a service for user data.

classes.name: AdminUsersComponent
classes.description: Angular component for administrating user accounts, with features for listing, sorting, and viewing user details.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook invoked on component initialization, triggering the load of user data.

methods.name: onSort
methods.description: Handles sorting of the user list based on selected column key.

methods.name: openUser
methods.description: Sets the selected user and opens the modal to show user details.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the list of users from the AdminService and updates the component's user list.

methods.name: sort
methods.description: Sorts the user list based on the current sort key.

ctags.name: User
ctags.pattern: /^    const k = this.sortKey as keyof User;$/

ctags.name: k
ctags.pattern: /^    const k = this.sortKey as keyof User;$/
